item.title: DeSantis picks Florida attorney general to replace Marco Rubio in Senate
item.description: Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis on Thursday said he would appoint Ashley Moody, his state’s attorney general, to replace Marco Rubio in the Senate.

item.title: Trump names Senate aide to FCC, which would give GOP a majority
Live updates: Senate holds confirmation hearings for Treasury, EPA, other Trump Cabinet posts
item.description: The Senate is holding more confirmation hearings for President-elect Donald Trump’s Cabinet picks ahead of his return to office on Monday.

item.title: Biden again takes credit for Israel-Hamas deal: Road ‘was not easy’
What is an oligarchy? The warning Biden issued in his farewell, explained.
item.description: Is the president on target with that criticism? Here’s what to know.
